newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech c.bank rev repo ave yield dips to 44.43 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech c.bank rev repo ave yield dips to 44.43 pct.

text.p: The average yield in a Czech central bank (CNB) one-week reverse repo tender draining liquidity from the market on Tuesday dipped to 44.43 percent, from 45 percent in its last one-week operation on Monday, the CNB said.
